content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.deltaCetasTest
 WITH (
     LOCATION = 'customer2/',
     DATA_SOURCE = [lake_vyadls_dfs_core_windows_net],  
     FILE_FORMAT = snappy
 )  
 AS
 SELECT *
 FROM OPENROWSET(
     BULK 'https://vyadls.dfs.core.windows.net/lake/customer',
     FORMAT = 'Delta') as f;
    
 SELECT * FROM dbo.deltaCetasTest;
